subject: Good Day,
body:
Good Day,
How are you doing today? My name is Walsh Philip, I live in the
United Kingdom and work with NatWest Bank UK.
I am glad to be connected with you. I have a business proposal I
would like to discuss with you in private. It involves a business
opportunity that will be of huge financial benefit to both of
us.Further details will be shared after I receive your response.
Kindly reply with your full name and your country of
Origin/residence.
Yours Truly,
Walsh Philip.
Operational Manager.

subject: Re: Good Day,
body:
Hello Walsh Philip,

It's a pleasure to meet you! I hope you're having a great day in the United Kingdom. Your business proposal sounds intriguing, and I'm always open to new opportunities. Could you please share more details about it? 

Just to clarify, I'd prefer not to share my full name or country of residence at this time. I hope that's okay with you.

Looking forward to hearing more about your proposal!

Best regards.

Best wishes,
Calvin
